Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Iahmosenefersekhmet, Priest of Ptah and Sacristan in the Great Place with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding a relief adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the waist is inscribed with a row of incised Hieroglyphs and the front of the leg section is inscribed with a similarly inscribed column; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
